quote_first:
He figured he’d start her out with an exceptionally American meal: cheeseburgers, fries, potato salad, Coke. He’d get a pie for dessert: apple. He’d top it off with ice cream and watch as she squirmed and squealed. When she finished, he’d lift her from her chair, carry her to the bedroom, kiss every inch. They’d have sex all night, and this time, he wouldn’t pay.
He looked at his watch—
title: Reprieve
author: James Han Mattson

quote_first: On the evening before K.’s thirty-first birthday - it was
quote_last: , when there is a lull in the streets - two gentlemen came to his apartment.
title: The Trial
author: Franz Kafka
